boardgame.name: Catan Histories: Struggle for Rome
I Coloni di Catan: Battaglia per Roma
La conquête de Rome
Kampf um Rom
De kolonisten van Catan: De val van Rome
Taistelu Roomasta
De Val van Rome
Поселенцы: Битва за Рим
boardgame.description: Catan Histories: Struggle for Rome is a new Settlers of Catan game. The game can be compared with the Settlers historical scenarios._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On the board you have a fixed map that represents southern Europe. The players represent Germanic tribes that are marching on Rome. Each player has two armies that start in the northeastern corner of the board. These armies will move across the board, pillaging cities for resources._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From the Box:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Romans rule over an enormous empire. It stretches from Great Britain to North Africa, from Spain across the Black Sea. But now, Rome holds its imperial breath. The empire is weak, and wild barbarian hordes from the vast eastern steppes surge across the frontier._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You are the ruler of one of those barbarian hordes, pouring into the rich and decadent West. Fast horsemen and dangerous warriors - lured by the rich Roman cities ready for plunder - follow your every command._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Your noble tribe is strong, but rival princes stand in your way! Are you wily enough to outmaneuver them? Can you find a swifter way to your rich goals? Can you concentrate your savage forces at the crucial moment? Can you outpace the other princes as you pillage city after city?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;But before your warriors grow weary of wandering, will you have enough wealth from plundering to found your own kingdom? Your fate is in your hands: civilization is ripe for conquest! Will you forge a mighty new kingdom? Or disappear into the vortex of history?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Will you be the one to inherit the storied glory of Rome?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Contents: 1 game board, 40 plunder counters, 90 cards, 40 gold coins, 4 turn overview cards, 2 dice, 1 legionnaire, rulebook, over 100 miniature plastic figures._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Received this game directly from Mayfair as a prize in a Settlers of Catan tournament. Game is still in shrink, but has a ding in one corner (see picture). Buyer will pay actual shipping costs via USPS Priority Mail.

This game is brand new and has never been played. The Romans rule over an enormous empire. But now, Rome holds its imperial breath as wild barbarian hordes surge across the frontier. Civilization is ripe for conquest! Forge a mighty new kingdom and inherit the storied glory of Rome in this second title in the Catan Histories series. Credit card and money orders accepted. Please send paypal payments to thegamegeek@gmail.com.

This game is brand new and has never been played. The Romans rule over an enormous empire. But now, Rome holds its imperial breath as wild barbarian hordes surge across the frontier. Civilization is ripe for conquest! Forge a mighty new kingdom and inherit the storied glory of Rome in this second title in the Catan Histories series. Will ship Priority Mail for $10.00 or UPS Ground for $9.00. Delivery confirmation, tracking number and combined shipping are all available. Please email thegamegeek@gmail.com with preference of shipping. If no reply, it will ship UPS Ground. Credit card and money orders accepted. Please send paypal payments to thegamegeek@gmail.com.

International buyers are very welcome, but please contact me for a shipping price quote to avoid any surprises or misunderstandings.
